name: CorticosteroidsSystemic
title: Corticosteroids, Systemic
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to glucocorticoid corticosteroids.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes single-ingredient betamethasone, budesonide, cortisone, deflazacort, dexamethasone, hydrocortisone, methylprednisolone, prednisolone, prednisone and triamcinolone that is administered systemically.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes mineralocorticoids, multi-ingredient glucocorticoid combinations and non-systemic formulations.)
